sentences: Nad alustasid naeruga, kuid lõpetasid nutuga.
Kumb teist tüli alustas? Alustasime sellest, et .. Nad alustasid naeruga, kuid lõpetasid nutuga.
context: The word 'lõpetasid' is the past tense plural form of the verb 'lõpetama', which means to finish, complete or end something. It describes an action that has been completed in the past by multiple subjects (you/they). In Estonian, '-s-' indicates past tense and '-d' indicates plural subject.
